author: gballet
content: sorry I missed that first message. Yeah it's another go issue, a list of bytes will be serialized as a hex number, got to fix that as well

author: gballet
content: iirc (that was over 6 months ago) we did that because lighthouse wasn't able to handle a fork out-of-sequence. Might be wrong though. We would have to see with <@818245058541125662> if this can be done now that the next relaunch is post-capella.

author: gballet
content: yes but we are going to relaunch an updated version of the testnet and will not provide support for that before the relaunch: https://github.com/ethpandaops/verkle-testnet/tree/master/kaustinen-testnet

author: jsign
content:
Hey everyone, as you might noticed in the agenda, we're still early discussing "Preimages generation and distribution".
I wrote the following document: https://hackmd.io/@jsign/vkt-preimage-generation-and-distribution
Hopefully, this document can help more people to join the following calls (e.g: tomorrow) where we'll continue to explore the problem and possible solutions.
